data.actual_result: The emote reaction has long rectangle border. If you observe the screenshot, the bubble size looks like for tens but it only have 1 reaction count. Sometimes it can be a hundreds size but still have 1 digit count.
data.short_description: Emote reaction bubble is wider than the original (Originally Reported and reproduced on 6.6.2 and 6.6.6).
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server and load a text channel that has small reactions or add a reaction in a writeable text channel if it does not have any. Move to another server and text channel and do the same thing. - Go back and forth to servers that has or where you added reactions. Keep doing this until you get the bug. Observe the reaction bubbles.
